Entries.default:
The light shining upon the book resting on this pedestal seems to darken the words on the volume's pages. 

The writing grows slick and indistinct, eventually running down the slanted pages and off of the tome entirely, into a trough set along the bottom of the lectern to catch it.
[Place the Memoirs of Heldr on the lectern.]
Light shimmers down upon the tome, and the words of Weyc Heldr melt away.

Ink runs from between the pages as well, giving the impression that the book weeps.

When the last of the ink dribbles from the book, the pages are left entirely blank.
The Lectern of Obfuscation stands empty before you.
